name: Yggdrasil (Armanlone)
description:
A dark surreal game inside the World Tree: Yggdrasil...

  • Travel inside the World Tree.
  • Meet bizarre characters.
  • Discover the dark story behind it.

This is a demo that displays the basic mechanics and concepts of what would this game will look like in the future.

Updates are posted on Twitter | Comments/Feedback/Suggestions can be posted through topics below.
